text: 'idha alsama' tsddaet, wtfttart bialghamam yawm alqyamt, wataet 'amr rabiha fima 'amriha bih min alanshqaq, whuqq laha 'an tnqad lamrh. wa'iidha al'ard bustt wawussiet, wdkt jbalha fi dhalik alyawm, wqdhft ma fi btnha min alamwat, wtkhllat enhm, wanqadt lirabiha fima 'amriha bh, whuqq laha 'an tnqad lamrh
